Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation until SW-Reviewer Agreed is performed in cases that eventually reach reviewer agreement
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the segment starting with Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and ending with SW-Reviewer Agreed, specifically in variants that include a revision cycle (e.g., those containing RW-Initial Reviewer Selection)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Manuscript Export Succeeded compared to the time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Total resolution time of the phase initiated by Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and concluded by the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Plagiarism Originality Report Completed versus minimum time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Elapsed time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants where reviewer assignment required multiple invitation reminders (e.g., containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2) versus variants without such reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in cases that experienced delays due to SW-Reviewer Declined or SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that passed through SW-Awaiting AE Assignment versus those that passed through SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in the longest-performing variant versus the shortest-performing variant that includes both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation until the first reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-AE Assign Reviewers) compared to the waiting time until SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Cycle time of the subprocess starting at Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and ending at SW-Reviewer Agreed, measured as the total duration encompassing all intermediate activities in that interval
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name to identify outlier cases with exceptionally long or short durations
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
